Event.name: Attending
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> goes to an <fen>Event</fen> and is present in a relatively non-participatory way.
<ex><fex name="Agent">The Angolan guerrillas</fex> will <t>attend</t> <fex name="Event">a September meeting</fex> <fex name="Place">in Zaire</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">We</fex> just <t>go</t> <fex name="Event">to the movies</fex> <fex name="Time">when it rains</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">His</fex> <t>attendance</t> <fex name="Event">at the funeral</fex> did not go unnoticed.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person who chooses to make himself present at the <fen>Event</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Event
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Event</fen> is the deliberate set of happenings given at a particular time and place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The way in which the <fen>Agent</fen> went about going to the <fen>Event</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>Through what strategies and efforts the <fen>Agent</fen> made possible his attendance at the <fen>Event</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>Under what conditions the <fen>Agent</fen> goes to the <fen>Event</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The reason why the <fen>Agent</fen> goes to the <fen>Event</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition: <def-root>This frame element is defined as the number of times an event occurs per some unit of time. </def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Duration denotes the length of time from the beginning of a continuous situation (the one denoted by the target) to its end.</def-root>

Arg.name: Iterations
Arg.definition: <def-root>The frame element <fex name="Iterations">Iterations</fex> is used for expressions that indicate the number of times an event or state (of the kind denoted by the target in its clause) has taken place or held.</def-root>

Arg.name: Event_description
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the event as a whole.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: attend.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to be present at a given time and place

lexUnit.name: go (to).v
lexUnit.definition: FN: be at and attend an event

lexUnit.name: attendance.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: being present at an event
